title: Ebert & Roeper - 06.22.08 - guest host Michael Phillips
description:
Ebert & Roeper  -  June 22nd, 2008 - with guest host [url=http://www.chicagotribune.com/features/chi-michaelphillipscritic,1,931773.storygallery?coll=chi-entertainment-utl]Michael Phillips[/url], film critic for the Chicago Tribune

---- New movies this week:
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0425061/]Get Smart[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
SPOILERS - The following list gives the thumbs up or thumbs down vote which the movies received.  (Phillips - Roeper)
-------------------------------------------------

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0425061/]Get Smart[/url]  -  down - (solid B+ effort) up
-- Steve Carell - Anne Hathaway - Dwayne Johnson - Alan Arkin

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0846308/]Kit Kittredge: An American Girl[/url]  -  up - up  -  ( "very well made family film" )
-- directed by Patricia Rozema - ( Mansfield Park )
-- Abigail Breslin - Julia Ormond - Chris O&#039;Donnell - Stanley Tucci - Joan Cusack

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0811138/]The Love Guru[/url]  -  down - down
-- Mike Myers - Jessica Alba - Romany Malco - Justin Timberlake - Verne Troyer

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0910970/]WALLÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â·E[/url]  -  (way) up - (way) up  -  ( "a rich and visually sophisticated achievement for any age" )
-- animated film from PIXAR

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0416044/]Mongol[/url]  -  rent it - up
-- directed by Russian director Sergei Bodrov

		--Phillips:

			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0814130/]The Hammer[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Hammer-Adam-Carolla/dp/B00151QYFS/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1214257456&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]

	---NEW ON VIDEO
